author: Renee Roberts
comment: I have been a member with commonwealth for a long time & I use this app alot. It's easy-to-use & track money. It be very nice if the commbank youthsaver app was able to be used on samsung mobile/tablet not just apple, so my child can keep track of her dollarmites account she has with her school 😟

author: Warren Meeds
comment: Pretty great app. But can still be improved upon. You should still be able to logon without an internet connection. Set it up so that it still shows up your money and have the app update every hour. That way when your in an emergency situation and have no internet you can still see how much you had recently

author: David Griffiths
comment: Not a bad app, but the addition of a built in keyboard that persistently pops up is ridiculously annoying. Please remove this! Not everyone is so lazy that they need a keyboard with default words like "car", I'm quite able to type that in myself.

author: Michael Debenham
comment: Solid banking app and the best I've used among the big banks. Tap & pay works well. Only small niggle is that a recent update changed the icon to an adaptive one that is just the old logo in a square now also in a white circle, looks a bit lazy and ugly.

author: Preethi Krishnadas
comment: Hi CBA, the new spending tracker is a great feature, eliminates the need to use a seperate tracking app. One feedback would be to have credit expenses track against the actual date the expense was incurred instead of when it clears. Thanks!

author: Dean Perryman
comment: Worked fine until the stupid girl in one of the branches recommended I reinstall it. Only then did I find out I can't use the app any more because I have a net code token. Train your staff  to get it right cba. Now the app is junk because I can't log in without ditching the security token.

author: Scott Bowler
comment: I DID work on my S8+ but after an update 2 weeks ago it hasn't work since... i have reinstalled and restarted my phone... eftpos machine says invalid transaction... before this it was an awesome app

author: Julian Slamkovic
comment: Can't cancel a direct debit in app!? C'mon... Sitting on hold for over 20 minutes for something so simple. My frustration means you get 1 star. Also change that hold music once in a while and don't send your phone customers insane before speaking to anyone.

author: Rachel Nevada
comment: I'm sick of seeing those two idiots on the beach. Any way to change the background myself?

author: Spartan
comment: Ever since my phone updated to Android 8 Oreo the Tap & go feature stopped working. I had to set up Android pay which works great to get out of trouble and paying the bill!!

author: norm facy
comment: All I can do now with app is access tap and pay with finger print and nothing else ! App is having so many problems now 😒
Been 1 month since I'm not able to see my super. You need to fix this asap, went into a branch and they said they will get it fixed but nothing

author: Rajal C.
comment: Please enable compatibility for Samsung Gear 3 to verify CBA cards using Samsung pay for Gear. Currently the app opens CBA app but fails to verify saying that the CBA app needs to be updated, which it already is.

author: Shane Miller
comment: This app is superior to those offered by many of CommBank's competitors, and the range of services offered within the app continues to grow. It's not like you have a choice of apps with which you can manage a Commonwealth Bank of Australia accounts, but if I did get to choose, this would be the one I would be using. Would give the app five stars if the development team would add a simple feature (available in the desktop internet banking site) offering the option to buy mobile phone credit for Telstra and Optus prepaid services

author: Rocky Wei
comment: Can't believe tap and pay function is still not fixed since last Aug. very disappointed.

author: towerofpower256
comment: Makes things absurdly easy. Can't do everything that NetBank can, but if you need to do something quick, this app is great.

author: Likarra Morgan
comment: I have been a CommBank customer for a year now & their app surpasses all other banking apps I have used. Love it!!

author: Mohamed Farhan
comment: It gets worse update after another, if you have previous versions don't update or download it.

reply.author: Commonwealth Bank of Australia
reply.content: Hi Mohamed Farhan. We’re working on improvements to Tap & Pay and would like hear more about your experience when using it. If you have a moment, please email your contact details to mobilequestions@cba.com.au and we’ll be in touch as soon as possible.

comment: User unfreindly app. Very hard to understand whats going on in the app.  In the transactions, only the amount of transactions are registered. Its not clear how much was it before and after the transaction

author: Alicia Gibson
comment: I have been with comm bank for over 20 years!! This app makes my banking very easy as its all at your finger tips hey extremely easy to use and very convenient too

The note 8 update has improved fingerprint login on my pixel it seems,hope you have applied same to CommSec app as thats been a pita also All good again so back to 5 stars, please don't make me have to edit again

author: Sarah Austin
comment: Apparently transactions on the commbank app can go missing?! I'm now in a dispute with my loan provider over a payment that apparently doesn't exist on the commbank app. Aren't you a bank!!! Note for everyone reading and paying attention the commbank app is useless... Doesn't even provide a running balance, stick to the netbank login instead. Cheers from a soon to be ex commonwealth bank customer

author: Gaith Bader
comment: Improved vastly throughout time and keep improving all the time. I like that their app is in active development and does everything I expect it to do.
Typical poorly thought out rubbish amateurish Australian software.  LOUSY interface, missing basic features.  Why release and foist such sub-standard fifth rate junk onto customers.

author: Lukas Sigut
comment: Tap & Pay stopped working months ago on OnePlus 3T :-(

author: Ben Schebella
comment: If it aint broke dont fix it. It was GREAT the way it was. Simple and effective

author: Amaw Scritz
comment: Please add expense categories for Insurance, Child/Day Care, Mortgage

author: P Patel
comment: With latest update it is keep crashing on my phone

author: Shannon Irwin
comment: Doesn't refresh properly anymore so balances aren't up to date

author: Jerimia Suheli
comment: Finger print to login fixed on the Note8 latest firmware. Thanks for the fix. Support Samsung Pay now.

author: Xinh f
comment: Will be great if supports AMEX credit card tap&pay, please support Samsung Pay ASAP.

author: Paul Devlin
comment: I don't use ( or ever want to use) tap and pay - but the service is always running in the background on my phone. I don't want it there. Can I disable this permanently?

author: Reza Bolouri
comment: Be very careful using this app, it is generally very good, however recently has begun showing transactions that do not exist, or match the commbank website.

author: Yashar Takaloo
comment: Keep getting better and better, transcend beyond expectations

author: abdihakin harti
comment: The app is buggy af dont download it at all, either you go to other banks or just use their website

author: Paul Lyon
comment: Pity you can't add all of my debits to the future transaction list, the quick balance has stopped working properly,  can only update if I open the full App

author: Abingdon Sovereign
comment: Tap and pay doesn't work. Reinstalled and reset app many times. Please help. Otherwise a good app.

author: Lachlan Young
comment: Great that we can now use PayID. Would be even better if we could save them to the address book...

author: Lincoln Armstrong
comment: Used to be great until the latest update on the 14th of Feb. Now the app just hangs on startup (with the beach background) and sits there for at least 20 secs until the app is even usable.  Also gets a 1 star rating until Samsung pay works (Gear S3 Frontier watch payments).

author: Felicia108
comment: Where did all the icons go?
